cmp: 会 (can/be possible/be able to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association, to balance an account/accounting)

exm.mng: appealing to the masses, universally appreciated (idiom)

exm.pyn: shí bù yàn jīng , kuài bù yàn xì

exm.mng: lit. to eat but finely ground grain and finely chopped meat (idiom, from Analects), fig. to be fastidious about one's food
exm.pyn: shí bù yàn jīng , kuài bù yàn xì
